mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, cancel_applicant = #{cancelApplicant}, cancel_date = now() WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
mapper.select: SELECT reservationB.* FROM reservation AS reservationA LEFT JOIN reservation AS reservationB ON DATE(reservationB.start_date) = DATE(reservationA.end_date) AND reservationB.start_date > reservationA.end_date AND reservationB.meeting_room_id = reservationA.meeting_room_id AND reservationB.state = 'R' where reservationA.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
